Lucas Tcheyan

ltcheyan@gmail.com

Crypto professional and NFT trader. Former Carnegie Endowmnent for International Peace (based in Beijing for 4+ years) and Goldman Sachs. I most enjoy learning about History, playing soccer, and watching the Jacksonville Jaguars.

Experience

MeshSwap Protocol

Founding Member

Oversee business development and partnerships. Led outreach to centralized and decentralized exchanges to identify key partnership value propositions. Contributed to white paper drafting and growth strategy formulation.

July 2021 - Present

Messair Hub

Digital Asset Analyst

Research, draft, and publish articles and asset profiles on digital assets and industry trends.

July 2021 - Present

Carnegie Endowment for International Peace

Research Analyst

Foreign policy analyst based in Beijing, China. Chief of Staff to Center Director.

June 2016 - June 2021

Goldman Sachs

Analyst

Financial analyst for Goldman Sachs Asset Management (GSAM), focusing on U.S. institionsal sales.

July 2014 - July 2016

    Interests

    Apart from being a web developer, I enjoy most of my time being outdoors. In the winter, I am an avid skier and novice ice climber. During the warmer months here in Colorado, I enjoy mountain biking, free climbing, and kayaking.

    When forced indoors, I follow a number of sci-fi and fantasy genre movies and television shows, I am an aspiring chef, and I spend a large amount of my free time exploring the latest technology advancements in the front-end web development world.
